Name: name
Description: Identification name of the grid generator (in alphanumeric characters only)

Name: caption
Description: Name of the grid generator (any characters can be used)

Name: version
Description: Version number, in a form such as \\"1.0\\" or \\"1.3.2\\"

Name: copyright
Description: Name of copyright owner; basically in English

Name: release
Description: Date of release, in a form such as \\"2010.01.01\\"

Name: homepage
Description: URL of the web page that provides information on the grid generator

Name: executable
Description: Filename of the executable program. (ex. GridGen.exe)
